name: Snow Thy Enemy
description:
A zany bash-up of Katamari Damacy, Hidden in Plain Sight and Quake ;)

In this game you can hide in the snow!

In this game you can crush your enemies by rolling snow balls onto them!

In this game you can throw poo at your enemies!

  • Artwork by Johan Spielmann
  • Sound & Music by George Abitbol
  • Programming by William 'wilbefast' Dyce

Created using LOVE 2D for @indietrainjam 2015, where the theme was "on track".
